infos.name: Detail Page Booster |  Die perfekte Produktdetailseite
infos.description:
Mit dem "Detail Page Booster" Plugin verleihen sie ihrem Shop nicht nur in puncto Design einen perfektionierenden Schliff, ebenso punktet unser Plugin auch in Sachen Funktionalität.

Das "Detail Page Booster" Plugin hilft ihnen dabei, ihren Kunden ihre persönlichen 5 ausschlaggebenden Verkaufsargumente klar sichtbar auf der Produktdetailseite darzustellen.


Wie binde ich die Icons in der Konfiguration ein?

Eine Liste aller verfügbaren Icons finden sie hier: https://bit.ly/3i6NXkf

Dort haben die einzelnen Icons einen Namen, beispielsweise : alert.svg

Wollen wir dieses Icon nun einfügen, müssen wir in der Konfiguration des Plugins die Zeilen mit der Aufschrift "Icon Name" einfach den Namen welcher vor dem .svg steht einfügen. In unserem Fall würden wir in die Zeile dann einfach "alert" schreiben. Danach klicken wir noch oben rechts auf den Button mit der Aufschrift "Speichern" und können nun das Icon im Front-End bewundern.

Sticky Shadow Navi

  Fixiert die Navigation des Shops am oberen Bildschirmrand.  

https://store.shopware.com/en/great73143839196/sticky-shadow-navi-unique-navigation.html


Einzeiliger Artikelname

  Kürzt den Namen der Artikel auf einzeilige Namen.  

https://store.shopware.com/en/great57213654419/one-line-article-name.html


Super Mega Slider

https://store.shopware.com/en/great75449913515/super-mega-slider-for-experience-worlds.html

infos.name: Detail Page Booster | The perfect product detail page
infos.description:
With the "Detail Page Booster" plugin they give their store not only in terms of design a perfecting polish, also scores our plugin in terms of functionality.

The "Detail Page Booster" plugin helps you to show your customers your personal 5 crucial selling points clearly visible on the product detail page.



How do I include the icons in the configuration?
A list of all available icons can be found here: https://bit.ly/3i6NXkf
There the single icons have a name, for example : alert.svg
If we want to insert this icon now, we have to insert in the configuration of the plugin the lines with the inscription "Icon Name" simply the name which stands before the .svg. In our case we would simply write "alert" in the line. After that we click on the button with the inscription "Save" in the upper right corner and now we can admire the icon in the front-end.


Show only the active categories in the shop sidebar to make your shop better and more minimalist.


USP Bar

Adds a bar where you can present certain information from your shop.

https://store.shopware.com/great75793114142/usp-bar-zeige-deine-features.html


Two Clicks Newsletter

Add a bar with a button that leads to a registration form of your choice.

https://store.shopware.com/great70084352783/zwei-klicks-newsletter-mehr-newsletter-anmeldungen.html


Detail Page Booster

Adds a list below the button in the shopping cart where you can reveal information about why exactly you should shop with you.

https://store.shopware.com/great38077411775/detail-page-booster-die-perfekte-produktdetailseite.html


Only Active Category

Displays only the category currently in use and hides all other main and sub-categories in the sidebar.

https://store.shopware.com/en/great47736286399/only-active-category.html


Magic Browser Tab

Animates the tab title as soon as the client moves the tab to the background.

https://store.shopware.com/en/great77627792083/magic-browser-tab-encourage-your-customers-to-come-back.html


Sticky Shadow Navi

  Fixes the shop navigation to the top of the screen.  

https://store.shopware.com/en/great73143839196/sticky-shadow-navi-unique-navigation.html


One Line Article Name

Shortens the name of the articles to one-line names.

https://store.shopware.com/en/great57213654419/one-line-article-name.html


Super Mega Slider

Photo, video, image and text slider for shopping worlds.

https://store.shopware.com/en/great75449913515/super-mega-slider-for-experience-worlds.html
